sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Squadron Mortars conducts an emplacement of a Mortar Firing Point (MFP) on 10 AUG 2023 on PA 256N IOT refine Platoon SOPs prior to Saber Junction ’23.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to maintain the momentum after Platoon STX by reinforcing mortar operations training and provide addition repetitions for the new privates prior to the CTC rotation.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct PCC/PCIs of NVGs and Mortar Weapon Systems
Day and Night Occupation of MFP
Maintain local area security throughout operations
MFP Defense/React to Contact
sections.END STATE:
friendly forces retain combat power for follow on operations; platoon refines SOPs for Mortar Operations in split section, and increase overall platoon lethality.
Training Objectives
Conduct hasty TLPs and issue FRAGOs
Conduct the maneuver of a Platoon
React to direct fire contact while dismounted
Day and Night MFP Recon
Day and Night MFP Occupation
